question: Under the GST regime, E-Way bill is mandatory of the value of inter-state movement of goods is more than __?
explanation: An e-Way Bill is an electronic permit for shipping goods any another similar to a waybill. It was made compulsory for inter-state transport of goods from 1 June 2018. It is required to be generated for every inter-state movement of goods beyond 10 kilometers and the threshold limit of â‚¹50,000.
